dict.string: Basic spells heal for an additional 15% over 6 seconds.
Periodic and Multi heals reduce their targets damage taken by 7.5% for 7 seconds.
Non-periodic healing shields the target for 10% of the healing done.
Healing done and cast times are reduced by 5%.
25% of Overhealing is distributed to injured allies.
Spells have a 5% chance to refund their energy cost.
Increases healing by 9% on Wizards, Warlocks, and Archers
Increases healing by 9% on Berserkers, Champions and Guardians.
Healing done is increased by 10% and spell costs are reduced by 10%.
If an ally would die instead you will instantly heal that ally for a small amount. This can not occur more than once every 30 seconds.
All healing done has a 3% chance to summon an Avatar that cast spells and heals allies by your side for 15 seconds.
